Name: The Enchantress
Notes: The work based on the lines of Virgil, was composed for the wonderful voice of Dragoslava Nikolic. It was not performed before the occasion of the 2000th anniversary of Virgil's death.
Long Description: Melodic Recitation on Virgil's poems for voice and piano. The work was composed for the wonderful voice of Dragoslava Nikolic and was not performed before the occasion of the 2000th anniversary of Virgil's death. The organizers probably forgot about the composition. It is to be hoped that it will be performed on the next such occasion - in a thousand years time...
Short Description: Melodic Recitation on Virgil's poems for voice and piano
